    • Method Detail

      • distance

        public double distance(ArrayList<org.apache.commons.math3.ml.clustering.DoublePoint> outlier_array)
        Description copied from interface: OutlierDistance
        Calculate the maximum outlier distance of a data set.
        Specified by:
        distance in interface OutlierDistance
        Parameters:
        outlier_array - An array of DoublePoints that the user has requested to be checked for outliers.
        Returns:
        A double containing the approximate cartesian distance between two points. A point within this distance of the primary cluster is considered a regular point; elsewise, it is an outlier.

      • getDistanceType

        public String getDistanceType()
        Description copied from interface: OutlierDistance
        Helper method. Provides the string representation of the type of distance being calculated.
        Specified by:
        getDistanceType in interface OutlierDistance
